name: Jim Ward
info:
• 简体中文名: 吉姆·沃德
  • 别名: James Kevin Ward
  • 性别: 男
  • 生日: 1959-05-19
  • 活跃时间: 1984至今
detail: James "Jim" Kevin Ward is an American voice actor, radio personality, camera operator. He was born in San Francisco, California.
